I am a  **Bioinformatics Data Scientist** that uses programming, statistics, and scientific methods to understand complex genomic and biological data. I did PhD in Genome Sciences and Technology at University of British Columbia, before becoming a Data Scientist at Sonoma, a cell therapy biotech company in San Francisco.
